body:
If you write a `when` wrong the resulting error message doesn't say where the when came from
`@when('@:0.87,@0.99:')`:
```
==> Error: Invalid version specifier
['hydrogen', '@:0.87,@0.99:']
         ^
```
or
`@when(':0.87')`:
```
==> Error: Unexpected token
['hydrogen', ':0.87']
          ^
```
These are easy enough to look for, but if the error is in a `depends_on` or a `conflicts` `when=`, tracking down the failing `when` is more difficult.
title: Unclear help message for "Invalid version specifier"
